ComicInfo.Series: The Old Guard: Tales Through Time
ComicInfo.Summary:
END OF STORY ARC
Who is...Yitzhak? The hulking figure briefly seen and spoken about in the TALES THROUGH TIME now takes the stage-GREG RUCKA and LEANDRO FERNÁNDEZ introduce a mystery that will alter the lives of the immortals forever...however long they have left! In present-day Paris, Andy and Nile pull a high-risk, high-stakes museum heist to steal a single unlikely item in a caper by VITA AYALA (Children of the Atom, Static) and NICOLA SCOTT (BLACK MAGICK, Wonder Woman: Year One)!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|----------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Leandro Fernandez & Daniela Miwa | 1 | | B | Cover B | Nicola Scott & Annette Kwok | 2 | | C | Cover C | Leandro Fernandez & Daniela Miwa | 3 |
Note: Joe and Nicky only appear on a variant cover.
ComicInfo.Tags: Nile Freeman,Marseille,Yusuf ibn Ibrahim ibn Muhammad ibn al-Kaysani,Booker,Andromache of Scythia,Nicolo of Genoa
ComicInfo.Title: The Bear; Many Happy Returns
